img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(95\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2895%29.png)
Continue down this path until you end up outside and find the beads on the ground.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a character standing in a dark, rocky cavern, looking towards an exit that leads to a brighter, outdoor area. The character is equipped with a large staff and appears to be ready for exploration or combat. The red marker in the image indicates the location of the Amber Prayer Beads on the ground outside the cavern. This image serves as a visual guide for players to locate the beads in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The preceding text provides instructions to reach this point, while the following text suggests additional guides for finding various items in the game.
